publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2751 Stewart Stevenson: Peterhead Academy - 2002 Rock Challenge—That the Parliament congratulates Peterhead Academy on winning the Scottish heat of the 2002 Rock Challenge, an international performing arts competition, with their superb production and performance of "When the Boat Comes in"; endorses the aims of the Rock Challenge which encourages young people to be the best they can without the use of alcohol or drugs, and wishes Peterhead Academy every success in the next stage of the competition to be held in May.

S1M-2751 Stewart Stevenson: Peterhead Academy - 2002 Rock Challenge—That the Parliament congratulates Peterhead Academy on winning the Scottish heat of the 2002 Rock Challenge, an international performing arts competition, with their superb production and performance of "When the Boat Comes in"; endorses the aims of the Rock Challenge which encourages young people to be the best they can without the use of alcohol or drugs, and wishes Peterhead Academy every success in the next stage of the competition to be held in May. Supported by: Shona Robison*, Michael Russell*, Brian Adam*
S1M-2751 Peterhead Academy - 2002 Rock Challenge (lodged on 14 February 2002) Robin Harper*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-2751 Peterhead Academy - 2002 Rock Challenge (lodged on 14 February 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-2751 Peterhead Academy - 2002 Rock Challenge (lodged on 14 February 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2751 Peterhead Academy - 2002 Rock Challenge (lodged on 14 February 2002) Irene McGugan*
